features: 【5 IN 1 TODDLER FIRE TRUCKS SET】The fire truck for toddlers includes a large transport truck and 4 small fire lifting truck/ladder truck/helicopter/plane. The body of mini fire trucks can rotate, adding fun to playing and attracting children, so each kids can learn some simple fire treatment measures.

【EASY TO OPERATE】As long as you push the toddler fire car truck gently, it can easily take 4 cartoon fire car trucks forward. In addition, the front of the car truck can be rotated, which is easy to turn around or avoid obstacles. The carriage can also be easily disassembled. Easy to use, children can simulate road conditions to increase playing fun.

【LIGHT&SOUND】The toddler fire car trucks toy for 1 2 3 4 5 6 years old comes with realistic whistle and flashing lights, just press the button on the top of the cab; don't worry about its noise disturbing the neighbors or others, it has muffling treatment and the sound and light only lasts about 8 seconds, improving children's cognition and arousing their playfulness, enjoying the different joy brought by the truck car.

【SAFETY FOR TODDLERS】It is made of high -quality ABS material, and the fine surface of the workmanship is smooth. You don't have to worry about the safety of your toddler when using it. It is designed for 2 3 4 5 years old boys, and the size is suitable for grasping and growing up with children.

【BIRTHDAY/CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR TODDLERS】Our trucks toys for 3 4 5 6 year old toddlers boys girls are packaged with beautifully designed gift box. It is very suitable for gifts for kids who give early educational toys, party gifts, holiday gifts, Christmas gift toys, suitable for 2 3 4 5 6 years old boys and girls.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.3 3.3 out of 5 stars 2,899 ratings 3.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Every little boys girls who loves cars trucks dreams of owning countless cars, this Bennol 5-in-1 carrier fire truck in trucks is perfect for 3 4 5 6 year old car truck lovers. Fun Multifunction Turn on headlights and sounds with one click. A cab that can be turned and disassembled.Reversible tailgate with ramp unloading.Every car has frictional power.Pushing forward or pulling backward can drive the truck forward.A large-size engineering vehicle is perfectly loaded with 4 small cars, carefully designed to fit the perfect size of a 3-year-old child's hand.Tips: Please do not use alkaline batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is great quality. Heavy plastic. Very durable. It was much smaller than I expected. Misleading photo representation of size of product. Otherwise very good for my 4 year old grandson.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size is small
reviews.reviewText: This is super cute but the picture is way deceptive. The actual size is about 1/3 the size. You guys should be ashamed. It’s false advertising in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: I liked the product. It seemed very good but it was just smaller than expected from the picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Actual size of toy is much smaller
reviews.reviewText: The only thing that was accurate about this toy was the fact they were fire truck themed. Nevermind that it doesn't make any sense why you have a carrier for miniature fire vehicles. I gladly purchased this because my toddler has been into firetrucks lately. But what a disappointment when this arrived. First, the scale of the toy is extremely deceptive in the product images. The smaller vehicles also seem to be a mismatch b/c the wheels don't quite fit the tracks on the larger carrier. And the build material and quality are quite different. For the actual size of the toy, it's not worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: This is 100% my fault, the sizing is correct in the description, but I was in a rush and just glazed them over. This was a gift for my nephew and I love that the trucks were all very well put together and not flimsy whatsoever, as he is 3 and I didn’t want any “loose” pieces he could break and choke on! So a great review on the material…. But the photos are a little deceptive when it comes to the actual “size” of the “big” & “smaller” trucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, reasonable cost
reviews.reviewText: Trucks are good size for 3 year old. Nice looking and will be fun for him

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as big as the picture shows...Beware
reviews.reviewText: This product is not nearly as big as it is pictured in the advertisement! Very misleading as for the actual size! 3 stars because my Nephew still loved it!I just felt very deceived and would definitely not have purchased it for the price I did due to it being very small. Bummer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great toy, deceiving image
reviews.reviewText: The toy itself - great! Nice quality, good looking, sturdy, fun to play. But a star off for pictures, there’s huge toy on the photo, yet it is a small vehicle, just about 50 cm long with four tiny cars inside. Very cool though
